short.ar: تحتاج إلى الحصول على الكرة إلى خط النهاية مع نادي الغولف عن طريق ضبط شريط الطاقة بشكل صحيح.
short.am: የኤሌክትሪክ ባርን በሚገባ በማስተካከል ኳሱን ከጎል ክለቡ ጋር ወደ መጨረሻው መስመር ማድረግ ያስፈልግዎታል።
short.bg: Трябва да стигнете топката до финалната линия с голф клуба, като регулирате правилно силовата лента.
short.bn: পাওয়ার বারটি সঠিকভাবে সামঞ্জস্য করে আপনাকে গল্ফ ক্লাবের সাথে ফিনিশিং লাইনে বলটি পেতে হবে।
short.ca: Cal portar la pilota a la línia de meta amb el pal de golf ajustant correctament la barra de potència.
short.cs: Musíte dostat míč do cíle s golfovou holí správným nastavením výkonové lišty.
short.da: Du skal have bolden i mål med golfkøllen ved at justere powerbaren korrekt.
short.de: Sie müssen den Ball mit dem Golfschläger zur Ziellinie bringen, indem Sie die Power-Bar richtig einstellen.
short.el: Πρέπει να πάρετε την μπάλα στη γραμμή τερματισμού με το μπαστούνι του γκολφ προσαρμόζοντας σωστά τη ράβδο τροφοδοσίας.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: You need to get the ball to the finish line with the golf club by adjusting the power bar properly.
short.es: Debe llevar la pelota a la línea de meta con el palo de golf ajustando la barra de potencia correctamente.
short.et: Peate palli golfikepiga finišisse viima, reguleerides jõuriba korralikult.
short.fa: شما نیاز به گرفتن توپ به خط پایان با باشگاه گلف با تنظیم نوار قدرت به درستی.
short.fi: Sinun on saatava pallo maaliin golfmailan kanssa säätämällä tehopalkkia oikein.
short.fil: Kailangan mong makuha ang bola sa tapusin ang linya sa golf club sa pamamagitan ng pag-aayos ng kapangyarihan bar maayos.
short.fr: Vous devez amener la balle à la ligne d’arrivée avec le club de golf en ajustant correctement la barre d’alimentation.
short.gu: તમારે પાવર બારને યોગ્ય રીતે સમાયોજિત કરીને બોલને ગોલ્ફ ક્લબ સાથે ફિનિશ લાઇન પર પહોંચાડવાની જરૂર છે.
short.he: אתה צריך להביא את הכדור לקו הסיום עם מועדון הגולף על ידי התאמת מוט הכוח כראוי.
short.hi: आपको पावर बार को ठीक से समायोजित करके गोल्फ क्लब के साथ फिनिश लाइन में गेंद को प्राप्त करने की आवश्यकता है।
short.hr: Morate odvesti loptu do cilja s golf palicom pravilnim podešavanjem trake za napajanje.
short.hu: A labdát a golfütővel a célba kell juttatnia a teljesítménysáv megfelelő beállításával.
short.id: Anda perlu membawa bola ke garis finis dengan tongkat golf dengan menyesuaikan bilah daya dengan benar.
short.it: È necessario portare la palla al traguardo con la mazza da golf regolando correttamente la barra di alimentazione.
short.ja: パワーバーを適切に調整して、ゴルフクラブでボールをフィニッシュラインに持っていく必要があります。
short.kn: ಪವರ್ ಬಾರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಸರಿಯಾಗಿ ಸರಿಹೊಂದಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ನೀವು ಚೆಂಡನ್ನು ಗಾಲ್ಫ್ ಕ್ಲಬ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಫಿನಿಶ್ ಲೈನ್ ಗೆ ತರಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 파워 바를 적절하게 조정하여 골프 클럽으로 결승선에 공을 가져와야합니다.
short.lv: Jums ir jānogādā bumba līdz finiša līnijai ar golfa nūju, pareizi pielāgojot strāvas stieni.
short.ml: പവർ ബാർ ശരിയായി ക്രമീകരിച്ചുകൊണ്ട് ഗോൾഫ് ക്ലബ്ബുമായി ഫിനിഷിംഗ് ലൈനിലേക്ക് നിങ്ങൾ പന്ത് എത്തിക്കേണ്ടതുണ്ട്.
short.mr: आपल्याला पॉवर बार योग्यप्रकारे समायोजित करून गोल्फ क्लबसह अंतिम रेषेपर्यंत चेंडू आणणे आवश्यक आहे.
short.ms: Anda perlu mendapatkan bola ke garisan penamat dengan kelab golf dengan menyesuaikan bar kuasa dengan betul.
short.nl: Je moet de bal met de golfclub naar de finish krijgen door de powerbar goed af te stellen.
short.no: Du må få ballen til mållinjen med golfklubben ved å justere kraftfeltet riktig.
short.pl: Musisz doprowadzić piłkę do mety kijem golfowym, odpowiednio regulując pasek mocy.
short.ro: Ai nevoie pentru a obține mingea la linia de sosire cu clubul de golf prin ajustarea bara de putere în mod corespunzător.
short.ru: Вам нужно доставить мяч к финишу с помощью клюшки для гольфа, правильно отрегулировав силовую планку.
short.sk: Musíte dostať loptičku do cieľa s golfovou palicou správnym nastavením napájacej tyče.
short.sl: Morate priti žogo do ciljne črte z golf palico, tako da prilagodite power bar pravilno.
short.sv: Du måste få bollen till mållinjen med golfklubban genom att justera kraftfältet ordentligt.
short.sw: Unahitaji kupata mpira kwenye mstari wa kumaliza na klabu ya gofu kwa kurekebisha bar ya nguvu vizuri.
short.ta: பவர் பட்டியை சரியாக சரிசெய்வதன் மூலம் நீங்கள் பந்தை கோல்ஃப் கிளப்புடன் பூச்சு வரிக்கு பெற வேண்டும்.
short.te: పవర్ బార్ ని సరిగ్గా సర్దుబాటు చేయడం ద్వారా గోల్ఫ్ క్లబ్ తో ఫినిష్ లైన్ కు బంతిని మీరు పొందాల్సి ఉంటుంది.
short.th: คุณต้องนําลูกบอลไปให้ถึงเส้นชัยด้วยไม้กอล์ฟโดยการปรับแถบพลังงานให้เหมาะสม
short.tr: Güç çubuğunu düzgün bir şekilde ayarlayarak topu golf sopasıyla bitiş çizgisine getirmeniz gerekir.
short.uk: Вам потрібно донести м'яч до фінішу ключкою для гольфу, правильно відрегулювавши силову планку.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like golf games! Take the best shot and pass the challenging levels. Golf Stick Sport Game is a great golf simulator with 2D graphics designed with a lined notebook theme. This fun game immerses players in the magical world of golf courses. The game's main objective is to show off your golfing skills by reaching the highest score. Missions that seem easy at first will become increasingly complex. At the same time, players will need to calculate their shooting skills and distance to the target accurately. When the game starts, you are given ten golf balls and try to score the highest using these balls.

Golf Stick brings a different aesthetic to golf games with its simple and attractive 2D graphics. The lined notebook theme is a touch that makes the game unique and offers a nostalgic feel. Players have an enjoyable gaming experience on golf courses designed with simple but impressive visuals.

The main goal of the players is to get the highest score. This can be easy at the beginner level, but moving the area leading to the goal in the later levels will require players to increase their skill and attention. Directed shots at the right target are the key to high scores. Golf Stick offers a tactical experience where players can improve their golf skills by observing the target and determining the most suitable shot angle and power.

The ten golf balls you have in the game are limited. That's why it's essential to plan your shots carefully and not take unnecessary risks. It would help if you managed your ball count well and took every shot with thought to advance to the next level or achieve high scores.

While this game keeps the spirit of golf, it also offers players a fun and addictive experience. This game, which can be enjoyed by golf lovers and those new to golf, brings the mini golf experience to digital platforms.

How To Play
Played with Mouse.

Golf Stick Sport Game Features
✓ 2D Graphics
✓ Basic control
✓ 2D Environment

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Golf Stick Sport Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
